content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you book a plumbing appointment. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mike! Could you provide the address where you need plumbing service?
Uh, it’s on Maple. You know, near the old grocery store.
Thanks, Mike. Could you please provide the full street address with the house or apartment number and zip code? This helps us confirm your service area and team availability.
I don’t remember the zip but it’s 142 Maple Street or maybe Avenue? It’s close to the downtown. I don’t have paperwork on me right now.

Thank you for that information, Mike. Could I confirm—is it Maple Street or Maple Avenue? Also, if possible, could you double-check and provide the zip code? This is required to proceed with the booking and make sure our tech can find you.
Man, I swear I don’t know. Isn’t my old address in your system? Can’t you just come if I say it’s the yellow house by the intersection?

I really want to help, Mike. Unfortunately, I need your full address, including street name, number, and zip code to book your appointment and ensure our technician finds you on time. If you can find this info and reply, I can quickly get you scheduled.
reason: Unable to get complete address from customer after multiple attempts.
